exceptions.exn: In environment prog : ImpProg post : Pred e : E.Env Unable to unify "(fix synt_wp (prog : ImpProg) (post : Pred) {struct prog} : Pred := fun e : E.Env => match prog with | Iskip => post e | @Iset A x expr => post (E.upd x (E.eval expr e) e) | Iif cond p1 p2 => (E.eval cond e = true -> synt_wp p1 post e) /\\ (E.eval cond e = false -> synt_wp p2 post e) | Iseq p1 p2 => synt_wp p1 (synt_wp p2 post) e | Iwhile cond p => exists (inv : Pred) (R : E.Env -> E.Env -> Prop), well_founded R /\\ inv e /\\ (forall e' : E.Env, inv e' -> E.eval cond e' = false -> post e') /\\ (forall e' : E.Env, inv e' -> E.eval cond e' = true -> synt_wp p inv e') /\\ (forall e0 : E.Env, inv e0 -> E.eval cond e0 = true -> synt_wp p (fun e1 : E.Env => R e1 e0) e0) end) ?M1518 ?M1519 e" with "exists e' : E.Env, exec e prog e' /\\ post e'".
